title: Teaching Apps for Econometrics
text:
Use the links below to open the interactive apps or run locally.


Explore endogeneity (ρ), instrument strength (γ₁), first stage, reduced form, and the weak-instrument F-test.
🚀 Open App
Direct URL (copy/paste):
https://felixnoth.shinyapps.io/iv_bias_weak_instruments/
Check R Code on my GitHub repository: https://github.com/felixnoth/Shiny-Econometrics/tree/main/apps/iv_bias_weak_instruments
